description:
ENTIRE COURSE COMPLETELY UPDATED MAY 2016!

_______________________________________________________________________

"This course really covers all the things that people really need to know to start a SEO business. All the free forms are super and all you have to do is modify them to use them. The instructor does a fantastic job at describing everything need to open a business."  - Bill Brooks

_______________________________________________________________________

In this course we dive deeply into what is required to run a successful and profitable SEO business from home. 

If you have little or no SEO experience we'll look closely at:

  • Your 4 main options for learning SEO & resources for learning
  • Understanding the most common SEO jargon
  • Helpful free and premium SEO tools to help you rank websites
  • And companies you can outsource SEO work to

This course is designed to help you take action and work towards setting up your own SEO business. You'll discover:

  • All that is involved in the entire client SEO workflow process
  • How to stand out from the competition and make the most money
  • 4 options for making money with SEO
  • How to upsell clients for maximum profit
  • Where to learn SEO and how to create a learning action plan
  • Where to find the SEO tools you'll need to complete any SEO job
  • How to determine your prices
  • How to deliver SEO proposals and SEO reports

And of course you can't truly be in business without any clients, so we'll spend time talking about how to attract new SEO clients and where you can find them. 

This course also gives you unlimited access to all of the business documents you will need to start an SEO business that you can download, edit and use in your own business.

_______________________________________________________________________

"Christine definitely knows what she is offering. I like the way she delivers the course. As she pointed out at the onset of the course, she will give you actionable tasks, and considerable information to get you started regardless of expertise you posses! Amazing course!" - Santosh Jadagoudar

_______________________________________________________________________

Now This is just a highlight of some of the topics we'll be covering and as you can see there is so much more to running an SEO business than just SEO itself.

I want to make sure you can stand out and be successful in this industry so you can achieve your goals that are motivating you to get started. I'll also be asking you to complete specific challenges throughout the course so your business is set-up by the time you complete the course. 

I'm also available inside so don't hesitate to ask questions as you start getting set-up building your business, and serving clients. I'm here to help you succeed so let's get right to it.
title: Start and Run a Successful & Profitable Home SEO Business
